Bruce Arians admits: In his 20-plus years coaching in the NFL, he never had a player leave training camp for 11 days. 
And yet? 
"I never had Tom Brady," the former Tampa Bay Buccaneers head coach … [+2426 chars]

articles.title: NFL rumors: Key Jimmy Garoppolo pay cut parameter had Trey Lance factor - NBC Sports
articles.description: When talks of continuing their relationship began between Jimmy Garoppolo's camp and San Francisco, there was one number in mind.
articles.content:
Jimmy Garoppolo took a massive pay cut to stick with the 49ers as their backup quarterback behind Trey Lance.
When discussions to continue the relationship between Garoppolo's camp and San Francisco… [+1499 chars]
